visual_enhancers.noise_texture: Use a subtle SVG noise overlay on the main background to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.glow_effects: Use colored shadows (shadow-cyan-500/20) instead of black shadows for primary elements.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 1px borders with 10-20% opacity for a technical, schematic look.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/outfit', '@fontsource/inter', and '@fontsource/jetbrains-mono' to package.json immediately.
2. TAILWIND CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors (primary, secondary, accent, background-paper) defined in the 'colors' section.
3. SHADCN OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, ALWAYS override the default radius to 'rounded-md' or 'rounded-lg' and ensure borders are 'border-white/10' in dark mode.
4. NO GRADIENT TEXT: Do not use gradient text for body copy. Only use it for very short, high-impact headlines (max 3 words).
5. DATA-TESTID: Every interactive element (buttons, inputs, links) MUST have a 'data-testid' attribute (e.g., 'login-submit-btn').
6. MARKETING PAGE: Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the features section. Do not just stack cards vertically.
7. DASHBOARD: The dashboard must feel like an IDE. Use split panes and dark backgrounds.
8. ANIMATION: Use 'framer-motion' for simple entrance animations (fade-up) on the landing page. Keep the dashboard snappy with minimal motion.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
